bug.short_desc: hawaii qt platformtheme plugin doesn't set FixedFont

long_desc.thetext:
See also bug #1330150 , the symptom is that running konsole on hawaii ends up using DejaVu Sans.
I suspect the cause is similar to lxqt's bug #1330150 where the platform plugin fails to set a valid FixedFont

Link to upstream bug: https://github.com/hawaii-desktop/hawaii-workspace/issues/7
Thanks for the report.

Fix is already on rawhide.
At this point I think I'm going send to Bodhi the new hawaii-workspace package for both F23 and F24 along with the other Hawaii updates.
Should be done over the weekend.
